mapper.insert: insert into bu.wq_professor_profile (first_name, last_name, school_id, overall_score, create_time, create_by, department_id, update_time) values (#{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{overallScore,jdbcType=REAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select: select id, first_name, last_name, school_id, overall_score, create_time, create_by, department_id, update_time from bu.wq_professor_profile where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
